remarks: The inverse relation is a function from isomorphisms to isomorphisms. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
invfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
invfval.n $e |- N = ( Inv ` C ) $.
invfval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
invfval.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
invfval.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
isoval.n $e |- I = ( Iso ` C ) $.
invf $p |- ( ph -> ( X N Y ) : ( X I Y ) --> ( Y I X ) ) $.
